title: John Stewart (rugby union)
text: is a <a href="Fijian%20people">Fijian</a> <a href="Rugby%20Union">rugby union</a> player who plays as a <a href="Centre%20%28rugby%20union%29">centre</a>. He represented the <a href="Sunwolves">Sunwolves</a> in the <a href="2016%20Super%20Rugby%20season">2016 Super Rugby season</a>. He also represented the <a href="Fijian%20Drua">Fijian Drua</a> in the <a href="2017%20National%20Rugby%20Championship">2017 National Rugby Championship</a>
